cards.name: Thopter Engineer
cards.text: When this creature enters, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.\nArtifact creatures you control have haste. (They can attack and {T} as soon as they come under your control.)

cards.name: Canoptek Scarab Swarm
cards.text: Flying\nFeeder Mandibles â€” When this creature enters, exile target player's graveyard. For each artifact or land card exiled this way, create a 1/1 colorless Insect artifact creature token with flying.

cards.name: Canoptek Wraith
cards.text: Wraith Form â€” This creature can't be blocked.\nTransdimensional Scout â€” When this creature deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {3} and sacrifice it. If you do, choose a land you control. Then search your library for up to two basic land cards which have the same name as the chosen land, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

cards.name: Canoptek Spyder
cards.text: Flying\nFabricator Claw Array â€” Whenever another nontoken artifact creature or Vehicle you control enters, draw a card.

cards.name: Thopter Arrest
cards.text: When this enchantment enters, exile target artifact or creature an opponent controls until this enchantment leaves the battlefield.

cards.name: Maverick Thopterist
cards.text: Improvise (Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)\nWhen this creature enters, create two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying.

cards.name: Chandra, Pyromaster
cards.text: [+1]: Chandra deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker and 1 damage to up to one target creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls. That creature can't block this turn.\n[0]: Exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn.\n[âˆ’7]: Exile the top ten cards of your library. Choose an instant or sorcery card exiled this way and copy it three times. You may cast the copies without paying their mana costs.

cards.name: Chandra's Revolution
cards.flavortext: Chandra was driven by her anger, directed particularly at the man who had taken her father from her.
cards.text: Chandra's Revolution deals 4 damage to target creature. Tap target land. That land doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

cards.name: Chandra's Outrage
cards.flavortext: Chandra never believed in using her "inside voice."
cards.text: Chandra's Outrage deals 4 damage to target creature and 2 damage to that creature's controller.

cards.name: Feedback
cards.text: Enchant enchantment\nAt the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted enchantment's controller, this Aura deals 1 damage to that player.

cards.name: Dismal Backwater
cards.flavortext: Armageddon has become a site of holy pilgrimage for the Orks: a planet where the fighting never stops.
cards.text: This land enters tapped.\nWhen this land enters, you gain 1 life.\n{T}: Add {U} or {B}.

cards.name: Backfire
cards.text: Enchant creature\nWhenever enchanted creature deals damage to you, this Aura deals that much damage to that creature's controller.

cards.name: Feedback Bolt
cards.flavortext: The path of least resistance is often through your enemies.
cards.text: Feedback Bolt deals damage to target player or planeswalker equal to the number of artifacts you control.

cards.name: Ancient Silverback
cards.flavortext: The Phyrexian killing machines couldn't have known the seriousness of their mistake in wounding the apeâ€”they'd never seen it angry.
cards.text: {G}: Regenerate this creature. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, instead tap it, remove it from combat, and heal all damage on it.)

cards.name: Silverback Ape
cards.flavortext: It does not wear a crown or sit on a throne of gold, but those who have witnessed its power hail it nonetheless.

cards.name: Grim Backwoods
cards.flavortext: "I love what they've done with the place."\nâ€”Liliana Vess
cards.text: {T}: Add {C}.\n{2}{B}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Draw a card.

cards.name: Windfall
cards.flavortext: "To fill your mind with knowledge, we must start by emptying it."\nâ€”Barrin, master wizard
cards.text: Each player discards their hand, then draws cards equal to the greatest number of cards a player discarded this way.

commander.name: Cho-Manno, Revolutionary
commander.flavortext: "Mercadia's masks can no longer hide the truth. Our day has come at last."
commander.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Cho-Manno.
